title: Urgot is the definition of cancer!
body:
[](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-l45fCpUosZM/WV_YrrSeEbI/AAAAAAAAomw/YL66EiDoy78ynZgWnQm4F9rNrX0aF73IACLcBGAs/s1600/crabgot-wallpaper-1920X1080.jpg)
-Released during July
->Star sign CANCER

-He's a Crab
->Cancer in latin as well as other similar nouns in various different tongues

-Giant enemy CRABGOT!

-Same team that did Warwick
->Means he's CertainlyT's handiwork!

The stars have aligned!
https://i.makeagif.com/media/1-04-2014/M1obvl.gif

Release the URGOD!

replies.body:
Actually, poros are the definition of cancer.

They won't die [x]
They multiply uncontrollably [x]
They spread across the map [x]
They cause nearby champs to supply them with nutrients [x]
One of these days, I *WILL* find a way to kill those blasted puff balls!
If you get them on a fountain, they'll get zapped.
They are actually immune to it now. Poro's are now the best tanks in the game.

but they cant be targeted. so people just ignore them

worthless teammates
Poro's were balanced until Riot gave them the ability to dodge base lasers.
Designer was Repertior and BelugaWhale, can confirm the cancer though, a bunch of us on the team were cancer birthdays too.

DONT CHANGE URGOD!  HE IS MY ONLY ZED COUNTER. 
Also, I'm still waiting for my Star Guardian Urgot... #SAVEURGOD #URGOTEEM

> [{quoted}](name=420Yolo4Jesus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=q262mHEI,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-07-08T06:45:38.682+0000)
>
> DONT CHANGE URGOD!  HE IS MY ONLY ZED COUNTER. 
> Also, I'm still waiting for my Star Guardian Urgot... #SAVEURGOD #URGOTEEM

new urgot might actually be pretty nice againts assassins. class wise he's a juggernaut (ie the thing that DARIUS is) so he has enough bulk to survive a full combo if he isn't behind and the stabber isn't too ahead and his E could flip people into turrets. for skirmishers, his passive is a massive F YOU, as circle strafing around urgot in melee range (aka a skirmishers basic play pattern, especially Fiora and Yasuo) results in urgot knee blasting them without breaking a sweat. not to mention the ult, just imagine screaming "HOW DO YOU LIKE IT" as you mulch that stupid weab into a sticky red mess >:D
Malicious metal for memes and games warden

Was it really CertainlyT? I could be wrong but I think he passed the designing off to someone else and moved elsewhere. I remember them saying something about it on the podcast after Warwick's rework. You know, those podcasts they canceled because nobody else listened to them? Yeah.

Anyway, I believe that's what I remember being said.
you could also say its certainlyt cancer
